name: DonActor
description:
DonActor App was my first project at Reskill Americans Program. The app was intended to facilitate the donation process of clothes. In this project, I conducted the five design thinking stages (Empathize, Define, Ideate, Prototype, Test). I designed the App itself as well as the name and Logo.


The project was intended to serve a fictional Non-profitable organization (World Citizen).


The App was color-coded to designate three different types of users (Donators, Intermediators, and Benefiteds).
